author: woolfel
msg: I updated the class to use JAI instead of the stock com.sun.image.
codec.jpeg.  the output generated by the stock one is terrible and
looks aweful. JAI produces much better quality. The new method
saves PNG files. I checked the license of JAI and it allows redistribution
in binary form. I will add the jar's to CVS.

author: woolfel
msg: New class for saving Graphics. I still haven't figured out how to set the
compression level for JPeg, so that it is higher quality. have to dig
around a bit and figure that out.

author: sebb
msg: Use separate column names instead of array entries
